text: DXLA-TV (also known as GMA TV-9 Zamboanga, GMA Zamboanga or GMA Western Mindanao) is a commercial television station. It is owned by GMA Network Inc.. ==Locations== Its studio complex is located at GNC Building, Sto. Ni√±o Village, Brgy. Putik, Zamboanga City. Its transmitter is located at GMA Compound Brgy. Cabatangan, Zamboanga City. ==Digital television== UHF Channel 41 (635.143 MHz) Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Note 09.01 480i 4:3 GMA GMA Zamboanga (Main DXLA-TV programming) Commercial broadcast (10 kW) 09.02 GTV GTV 09.03 HEART OF ASIA Heart of Asia Channel 09.06 HALLYPOP Hallypop 09.07 I HEART MOVIES I Heart Movies 09.31 240p GMA1SEG GMA Zamboanga 1seg broadcast == Areas of coverage == * Zamboanga City * Basilan * Portion of Zamboanga Sibugay * Portion of Zamboanga del Norte ==Rebroadcaster== Station Location Channels TPO DXLS Jolo, Sulu 12 (VHF) 100 W (10.25 kW ERP) ==Related pages== *List of GMA Network stations *Global Satellite Technology Services ==References== Category:Filipino television stations Category:Television channels in Asia
